Order #: Zip Code: Katom > Janitorial > Trash Cans&Accessories > Trash Cans > Decorative Trash Cans > Silhouettes Waste Container, Open Top, Plastic Liner, 12 gal, Textured Black Rubbermaid FGSH12EPLTBK Silhouettes Waste Container, Open Top, Plastic Liner, 12 gal, Textured Black

Retail Price: $281.00
$146.77 • Each Tweet The warranty will not be honored for residential or non-commercial use of any Commercial Equipment.

Rubbermaid FGSH12EPLTBK Description
Wow! This Silhouette's waste container features a 12 gallon capacity and a leak-proof plastic liner for added sanitation and easy clean ability. Because of this Rubbermaid Silhouettes waste container's unique half round construction this open top waste container is functional and stylish. Keep your business clean with a Silhouettes waste container today! Achieve fabulous style and waste containment at the same time when you invest in a Rubbermaid Silhouettes indoor waste container. The convenient hinged top contains trash discreetly and the leg levelers provide added stability. Place this Rubbermaid Silhouettes waste container in doorways, plazas, lobbies, offices and any place that requires attractive, functional waste management.
Standard Features:
12 gallon capacity Textured black Half round Open top Plastic liner 9"x18"x32"
Silhouttes Decorative Waste Container, indoor use, heavy gauge fire-safe powder-coated steel, convenient hinged top, leak-proof rigid plastic liners, leg levelers provide stability, ADA, UV, post-consumer recycled content. This item: 9" L x 18" W x 32" H, 12 gallon capacity, textured black finish. Typically ships in 14-21 days.
Product Specifications
Crated Weight: 39 lbs. Category: Trash Cans Type: Decorative Manufacturer: Rubbermaid Manufacturer Part Number (MPN): FGSH12EPLTBK
